  A       : [4.000000, 3.000000, 2.000000, 1.000000]
  A (hex) : 00 00 80 40 00 00 40 40 00 00 00 40 00 00 80 3f 
  B       : [-3.000000, -2.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000]
  B (hex) : 00 00 40 c0 00 00 00 c0 00 00 80 bf 00 00 00 00 

Test 128: Normal values
Result flags: ZF=1 CF=0
  A       : [0.000000, -inf, inf, nan]
  A (hex) : 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 ff 00 00 80 7f 00 00 c0 7f 
  B       : [-3.000000, -2.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000]
  B (hex) : 00 00 40 c0 00 00 00 c0 00 00 80 bf 00 00 00 00

  A       : [0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000]

Test 128: Zero test
Result flags: ZF=1 CF=1
